full_summary:
### Labour Services Support for Military Training Centers

#### Solicitation Number: W2683-23RB300/A

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Competition Type:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Cost-per-Point

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites bidders to submit proposals for labour services in support of Military Training Centers (METC) Valcartier and Nicolet. The scope of work is outlined in the Statement of Work attached to the solicitation.

**Key Dates and Times:**

*   **Publication Date:** March 10, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 30, 2023, at 14:00:00 ("two o'clock")
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 6, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** April 5, 2025

**Security Requirements:**

The proposed procurement is subject to various security requirements, as outlined in the solicitation. Bidders must familiarize themselves with the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada to ensure compliance.

**Services Requirements:**

To comply with Treasury Board policies and directives, bidders must provide required information as detailed in the bid solicitation.

**Language:**

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada: English or French.

**Attachments:**

The RFP is available on the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) website:

*   RFP documents (English): [.../w2683-23rb300-a-rfp-eng.pdf...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4177/w2683-23rb300-a-rfp-eng.pdf)
*   Amendment 1 (English): [.../w2683-23rb300-a---amendment-1-fr-en.pdf...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4177/w2683-23rb300-a---amendment-1-fr-en.pdf)
*   Amendment 2 (English): [.../w2683-23rb300-a--amendment-2-fr-en.pdf...](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4177/w2683-23rb300-a--amendment-2-fr-en.pdf)
